Summary: Redish-orange sphere to close for comfort.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 10:40pm, the dog wanted to go out, as I opened the patio door which faces West, comeing over the top of the house from the East, a bright redish-orange orb, sphere, ball shape, about 8-9 inches in diameter with a tracer tail "stopped" 22 feet in front of me at around 7.5 feet above the ground and then blinked out. It really scared me! I slammed the door shut and went running for my husband, I have no idea what it was, but it was to close for comfort. Needless to say, he had to let the dog back in.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around January 18th 2012
